V.ii.1.A.5.a
.
Assigning Weight to the Evidence
After assigning weight to the evidence
review the evidence in its totality, and
determine the
balancing of scales
.
Note
:Â  Do not assign weight unjustly or arbitrarily.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Principles of Reviewing and Weighing Evidence
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
